pageContext.claim: “That the State of the Union speech has been cancelled by Nancy Pelosi because she doesn't want to hear the truth. She doesn't want the American public to hear what's going on. And she's afraid of the truth.”
pageContext.analysis: Pelosi said she canceled the State of the Union address because security workers should not be working without pay because of the government shutdown. Trump later said she was within her rights to delay the address until after the government was reopened.
